name: Luz (Fay)
description:
Luz is a 2d horror adventure prototype. The objective is to survive a series of nightmarish apparitions that follows the player by turning on all the lights in the school.

My contributions: 

  • 2D Generalist
  • Concept Artist

Credits:

  • Yifan Zhang - Lead Game Designer and Programmer
  • Leili Shen - Game Designer
  • Haotian Lu - Programmer
  • Yulin Cai - Environmental Artist
